component.name: SkyBase Viewer
component.author: Murray lab (C2B2)
component.description: Displays detailed information about models resulting from SkyBase Analysis. Views include (1) a Jmol model viewer, (2) a bar chart for all models displaying model quality pG score, template coverage, model-template sequence identity and model rank, (3) a table with more detailed information about all the models, and (4) model-template and model-query sequence alignments.
